1.title: Na'im
1.plot: Standup Comedian Na'im loses a shoe, and his dignity, when Kevin takes him out on the TKO course. Tony's pretty sure Na'im needs to work on his pedicure game.

2.title: Wayne
2.plot: "Big Juicy" Wayne, or as Tony calls him "American Ninja Gummy Bear," is salty AF. Running the course has proven to him that Kevin is not his friend, because friends don't hit friends with frisbees.

3.title: Ashley
3.plot: Kevin's stylist, Ashley makes Kevin look good every day. On the TKO course, Kevin does not return the favor. With Tony's help Ashley wants to prove to America that she's athletic. And not from Ghana.

4.title: Matt
4.plot: HartBeat writer, Matt would not refer to himself as an "athlete." Neither would anyone else. And Kevin rubs his face in it on the TKO course. Tony simply adds salt to the wounds. Poor Matt.

5.title: John Burgandee
5.plot: Kevin's barber, "Burg" has a bone to pick. And Kevin better be careful the next time he sits in that chair. Because payback for a twisted ankle = one nappy ass fade. (*Not a good look.)

6.title: Glenda
6.plot: Kevin claims HartBeat writer, Glenda has a smart mouth. Glenda insists that's because she is smart (maybe smarter than Kevin.) She and Tony conspire for season two when they can flip the script and make Kevin run the course. *Maniacal laugh.

7.title: Kwan
7.plot: Kevin's videographer, Kwan lives behind the camera. Maybe he should stay there. Not only does he have a face for radio, but he's got a body built for weed. (*or by it.) Kevin and the course knock Kwan out, and Tony's ignorance kicks him while he's down.

8.title: Harry
8.plot: Harry showed up rocking game face. And stick 'em gloves. Dude was ready to play on Sundays, but Tony calls foul. Harry should probably stick with Tuesdays. Kevin lets him know right away the gloves won't help. They don't.

9.title: Tony & Friends
9.plot: After all the shade he's been throwing, it's finally Tony's turn to show up and run the course. But he must be scared. Because he brought some friends along to run it with him. Turns out comedy all-stars aren't necessarily athletic hall-of-famers, and Tony's attempt at Zone 3 would make his grandmama mad.

10.title: Hall of Fame
10.plot: Season 1 of TKO: In The Zone hurt. It hurt bad. But not to watch. The poor fools who Kevin convinced to run his course were the ones feeling the pain. We only hurt ourselves laughing at them. This is all the stuff that made us laugh the most.

imdb.plot outline: Kevin Hart is hosting TKO, a big prime time competition show over at CBS. And after watching so many people hurt themselves on the TKO obstacle course, he decided he had some friends and colleagues that he wanted to hurt personally. So, he put up a huge prize of his own money, and challenged his crew to come take it. They came. They ran. Kevin messed them up. And now, they're gonna sit down with our host, comedian Tony Roberts, to talk about it. And laugh about it. And throw some shade back at Kevin. He better watch his six.
